entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 30 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 30 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 45 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow at times this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blowing snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
